mapper.select: select rt.rec_title, rt.rec_subt, rpi.rec_img_file_name from recipe_tbl rt, recipe_page_img rpi where rt.rec_num = rpi.rec_num and rpi.rec_img_no = 0 order by rt.rec_num asc
select rt.rec_title, rt.subt, rpi.rec_img_name = rpi.rec_img_no from recipe_tbl rt, recipe_page_img rpi where rt.rec_num = rpi.rec_num and rt.cate_num = #{cateNum} order by rec_num asc

select rt.rec_date, rt.rec_view, rt.rec_title, rt.rec_subt, rt.rec_desc, rt.rec_ingre_main, rt.rec_sub, rt.rec_tool, rpd.rec_ from recipe_tbl rt, recipe_page_img rpi, recipe_page_desc rpd where rt.rec_num=rpi.rec_num=rpd.rec_num
